Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Sound the alarm!
By torey_luvullo on Saturday, August 5, 2000 - 06:28 pm:

reading the posts that have been put up since the game came out, everything seems peaches and cream. people are finding cards, winning matches, getting monsters, and planning the party for when colt is rescued.

i just read a post by have clue - will travel on the tecmo board though that makes me wonder if all this isnt premature. in it, he essentially says that once you have all the cards but the phoenix, the game becomes exponentially more difficult in all the ways it previously was easy.

it is still too soon to know if this is true or just a temporary roadblock for hcwt. however, if it is true, we will have to take on this game the way we did mr2 - playing and posting and putting our collective heads together on this site and others.

sounds like fun to me!

By John Hawley on Saturday, August 5, 2000 - 07:35 pm:

No telling, Torey. Getting the Phoenix card may just be the beginnings of our travels. Have you met the two guys from the East at the restaurant yet? Why is it that they can't go to the Championship Cup (they've been ordered not to)? And that slot called Plates is still bugging me. Did you ever get one of those kind of itches on the back of your neck? That's the feeling I'm getting.

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, August 5, 2000 - 08:19 pm:

you see john i have been playing too slowly to get itchy yet... im still worrying about why alice says everything twice!

By John Hawley on Sunday, August 6, 2000 - 09:47 am:

Speech Pattern Attack?... I think it's for those people who turn the BTL messages off. You can back out of a mistake that way. Just hit the cancel button and you can back up a step before the second notice. Helps if you've chosen to use a Dodge card against a Non-Dodgeable attack.
